name: Barton Gilanelli & Associates
description:
We're not a "yes" agency. We offer our best thinking with targeted, creative and unique solutions. But at the end of the day, we understand that the client makes the final decision. And that's ok with us.
We dedicate a team of seasoned professionals to each client. And with no distractions, that team basically becomes an extension of the client's communications function. Our commitment to account service is one reason our clients view us as a strategic partner.
